content: easy 5 round motifs which are joined as each motif is crocheted **size and gauge ** each motif measure about 1¾ inches 4 4 cm 372 motifs in a 12 x 31 arrangement will make a scarf/runner approximately 20 x 50 inches 51 x 127 cm **materials ** american thread company star or gem mercerized crochet cotton size 20 in white cream or ecru * 8 - 300 yard balls *or* 10 - 250 yard balls * steel crochet hook no 11 or 12
